sentences: Heidän oli vaikea kiivetää jyrkkään rinteeseen.
context: The Finnish verb 'kiivetä' means to climb or ascend. It is an action word that describes moving upward, typically by using hands and feet when dealing with steep surfaces like mountains, trees, walls, or stairs. The word can be used in various contexts including climbing physical objects as well as metaphorical situations where one needs to overcome obstacles.
